name: Crime
description:
Team Name Alone in the field

Gameplay Instructions Use WASD to move, hover the crosshair over items and press F to interact with them. Press LMB to throw them. 

What platform is your game built for?

Windows 64-bit

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission. -All assets were made by me during the jam.
